The Cat Therapist

Is your cat showing signs of depression?

Are they dealing with anxieties that you cannot explain?

Then you have come to the right place!

Here at The Cat Therapist, we make your cat's mental wellbeing the utmost importance. We are devoted to keeping your feline friends the happiest they can be!

Testimonials

Cherry

Cherry started to hide around our home all the time which wasn't like her. The Cat Therapist helped us find out this was a change in her home environment that had caused this, she's so much happier now!

Learn More

Greybeard

Greybeard suddenly started to have bad toilet habits and was no longer using his litter box as he had done in the past. We found out this was a new cat roaming the streets around our home thanks to The Cat Therapist

Learn More

Tabby

Tabby suddenly started showing aggressive behaviour towards us which was completely out of character. The Cat Therapist came to our home fast and worked with Tabby and found the underlying cause.

Learn More

Simba

Simba was feeling fearful and anxious in our home and we didn't know why. Luckily The Cat Therapist was able to find the source of the issue and Simba has never been better - 5 Stars from me!

Learn More

World Renowned Experts

We at The Cat Therapist look to leading World cat experts like Jackson Galaxy for advice when it comes to cat behavioural issues! See his video below for an idea of the advice we would give to our customers

Qualifications

  • MSc in Companion Animal Behaviour Counselling from the University of Edinburgh
  • A registered Clinical Animal Behaviourist with the Animal Behaviour and Training Council (ABTC)
  • Full member of the Association of Pet Behaviour Counsellors (APBC)
  • Certificated member of the Fellowship of Animal Behaviour Clinicians (FABC)
  • Certified Clinical Animal Behaviourist (CCAB), certified by the Association for the Study of Animal Behaviour (ASAB)
  • A full member of International Feline Behaviourists
